text: [Music]
hi I'm Robbie right and I'm here to talk
about two of the most important things
to consider when selecting a storage
services provider data durability and
global resiliency and how eight of us
and Amazon s3 can help you protect your
data anytime and anywhere at AWS our
most important priority is data
protection our global data center
network infrastructure and storage
services are first and foremost designed
to protect your data from errors
failures threats and outages no matter
what and how much data you store with
AWS Amazon simple storage service also
known as Amazon s3 is a WSS object
storage service and is used by companies
all around the world to store data for
millions of applications emerging tech
startups - the largest global
enterprises use Amazon s3 to store and
protect their data let's dive into what
Amazon s3 is designed to deliver eleven
nines of durability which means that for
every ten million objects stored you can
expect to incur an average loss of a
single object once every 10,000 years
how is this durability achieved AWS
regions are made up of multiple
availability zones or AZ's copies of all
objects uploaded to a multi easy Amazon
s3 storage class are created and stored
across multiple devices spanning a
minimum of three AZ's within an AWS
region this means your data is protected
and accessible to your end users and
applications at all times even if an
entire data center in that region
experiences an outage or a failure
another reason why Amazon s3 is the
storage service of choice is AWS as
global reach because Amazon s3 is
available in all AWS regions around the
world our customers can replicate their
data stored in s3 to any other AWS
region in order to reduce data latency
comply with local regulatory
requirements and create global
resiliency against regional failures
with AWS is global infrastructure and
Amazon s3 is easy to use cross region
replication tools you can copy or
transfer data from one region to another
thereby creating the resiliency you need
to effectively operate all around the
world most important all data that is
replicated or transferred to other AWS
regions is protected with the 11 nines
of durability that we just talked about
thanks for joining us be sure to check
out other Amazon s3 videos to learn more
about our management features security
protocols storage classes and ways to
optimize your storage resources for more
information please visit our website
